annotations.text: EN
annotations.translation: 英语

annotations.label: Page-header
annotations.text: Official Journal of the European Communities
annotations.translation: 欧洲共同体官方公报

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 22. "radio duties" shall include, as appropriate, watch keeping and technical maintenance and repairs conducted in accordance with the Radio Regulations, the International Convention for the Safety of Life at Sea (1974), (Solas Convention) and, at the discretion of each Member State, the relevant recommendations of the International Maritime Organisation (IMO), in their up-to-date versions;
annotations.translation: 22. “无线电职责”应酌情包括根据《无线电规章》、《国际海上人命安全公约》（1974 年）（《索拉斯公约》）以及各成员国自行决定的采用国际海事组织 (IMO) 相关建议的最新版本进行的值班和技术维护及修理；

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 23. "ro-ro passenger ship” shall mean a passenger ship with ro-ro cargo spaces or special-category spaces as defined in the Solas Convention, in its up-to-date version; 24. "STCW Code" shall mean the Seafarers' Training, Certification and Watchkeeping  (STCW) Code as adopted by Resolution 2 of the 1995 STCW Conference of Parties, in its up-to-date version';
annotations.translation: 23. “滚装客船”系指具有《索拉斯公约》最新版所界定的滚装货位或特殊类别空间的客船；24. “STCW 守则”是指 1995 年 SCTW 缔约大会第 2 号决定通过的海员培训、发证和值班 (STCW) 守则的最新版本；

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 24. "STCW Code" shall mean the Seafarers' Training, Certi fication and Watchkeeping (STCW) Code as adopted by Resolution 2 of the 1995 STCW Conference of Parties, in its up-to-date version';
annotations.translation: 24. “STCW 守则”是指 1995 年 SCTW 缔约大会第 2 号决定通过的海员培训、发证和值班 (STCW) 守则的最新版本；

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 2. the following paragraph shall be added to Article 22:
annotations.translation: 2. 在第 22 条中应增加以下段落：

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: ¹4. The amendments to the international instruments referred to in Article 1 may be excluded from the scope of this Directive, pursuant to Article 5 of Regulation (EC) No 2099/2002 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 5 November 2002 establishing a Committee on Safe Seas and the Prevention of Pollution from Ships (COSS) (*).
annotations.translation: “4. 根据 2002 年 11 月 5 日欧洲议会和理事会关于设立安全海域和防止船舶污染委员会 (COSS) 的 (EC) 第2099/2002 号条例第 5 条，第 1 条所述国际文书的修正案可排除在本指令范围之外 (*)。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 3. in Article 23, point 1 shall be replaced by the following:
annotations.translation: 3. 第 23 条第 1 点应替换为以下内容：

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: ‘1. The Commission shall be assisted by the Committee on Safe Seas and the Prevention of Pollution from Ships (COSS) created by Article 3 of Regulation (EC) No 2099/2002.'
annotations.translation: “1. 委员会应得到根据 (EC) 第 2099/2002 号条例第 3 条设立的安全海域和防止船舶污染委员会 (COSS) 的协助。”

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: Article 12
annotations.translation: 第 12 条

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: Amendment to Directive 2001/96/EC
annotations.translation: 对第 2001/96/EC 号指令的修正案

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Directive 2001/96/EC is hereby amended as follows:
annotations.translation: 现对第 2001/96/EC 号指令作如下修正：

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 1. in Article 3(2), the words 'in force on 4 December 2001' shall be replaced by 'in its up-to-date version';
annotations.translation: 1. 第 3(2) 条中的“2001 年 12 月 4 日生效的”替换为”最新版本的“；

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: '1.2. in Article 14, point 1 shall be replaced by the following: The Commission shall be assisted by the Committee on Safe Seas and the Prevention of Pollution from Ships (COSS) created by Article 3 of Regulation (EC) No 2099/2002 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 5
annotations.translation: ”1.2. 第 14 条第 1 点应替换为以下内容： 委员会应得到安全海域和防止船舶污染委员会 (COSS) 的协助，该委员会是根据欧洲议会和理事会 (EC) 第 2099/2002 号条例第 3 条设立的 5

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: November 2002 establishing a Committee on Safe Seas and the Prevention of Pollution from Ships (COSS) (*).
annotations.translation: 2002 年 11 月，成立了安全海域和防止船舶污染委员会 (COSS) (*)。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: '3.3. the following paragraph shall be added to Article 15: The amendments to the international instruments referred to in Article 3 may be excluded from the scope of this Directive, pursuant to Article 5 of Regulation (EC) No 2099/2002.'
annotations.translation: ”3.3. 在第 15 条中应增加以下段落：根据 (EC) 第 2099/2002 号条例第 5 条，第 3 条所述国际文书的修正案可排除在本指令范围之外。”

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: Article 13
annotations.translation: 第 13 条

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: Implementation
annotations.translation: 实施

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 1. Member States shall bring into force the laws, regulations and administrative provisions necessary to comply with this Directive no later than 23 November 2003. They shall forthwith inform the Commission thereof.
annotations.translation: 1. 成员国最迟应于 2003 年 11 月 23 日前使遵守本指令所需的法律、条例和行政规定生效，并立即将此情况通知委员会。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: When Member States adopt those measures, they shall contain a reference to this Directive or shall be accompanied by such reference on the occasion of their official publication. Member States shall determine how such reference is to be made.
annotations.translation: 当成员国采取这些措施时，应提及本指令，或在正式公布时附带提及本指令。成员国应决定如何提及本指令。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 2. Member States shall notify to the Commission the main provisions of their national law which they adopt in the field governed by this Directive.
annotations.translation: 2. 成员国应将其在本指令管辖范围内通过的国内法的主要规定通知委员会。

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: Article 14
annotations.translation: 第 14 条

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: Entry into force
annotations.translation: 生效

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: This Directive shall enter into force on the day of its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
annotations.translation: 本指令将在《欧洲共同体官方公报》上公布之日起生效。

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: Article 15
annotations.translation: 第 15 条

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: Addressees
annotations.translation: 对象

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: This Directive is addressed to the Member States.
annotations.translation: 本指令的对象是成员国。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Done at Brussels, 5 November 2002.
annotations.translation: 2002 年 11 月 5 日订于布鲁塞尔。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: '3. The amendments to the international instruments referred to in Article 3 may be excluded from the scope of this Directive , pursuant to Article 5 of Regulation (EC) No 2099/2002.'
annotations.translation: “3. 根据 (EC) 第 2099/2002 号条例第 5 条，第 3 条所述国际文书的修正案可排除在本指令范围之外。”
